channel.title: Avril Lavigne on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Avril Lavigne on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lauren Christy Wrote Hits for Avril Lavigne and Dua Lipa. Now She Warns of a “National Funeral for Songwriters If Things Don’t Change”
item.description: ‘Their Hits, My Way’ features Christy’s interpretations of classic songs she co-wrote throughout her career.
